Question
========

In a statistics class there are 40 students. Each time, the teacher chooses randomly one student to answer one question and then the teacher not return the chosen name. There are a total of three questions. What is then the probability that Marja will be called to answer one of the three questions? answer?

Solution
========

The correct answer is: 0.075
